description: > NAME EQUAL TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/croco | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CroCo cross-link converter' | a user-centred tool to convert results from crosslinking mass spectrometry experiments | Convert data formats from chemical cross-linking mass spectrometry (XL-MS) | The CroCo cross-link converter — CroCo documentation | CroCo converts multiple data format from cross-linking mass spectrometry software tools to xTable format (in csv format) | The CroCo cross-link converter ¶ | CroCo converts multiple data format from cross-linking mass spectrometry software tools to xTable format (in csv format). It is distributed as graphical programme to be run from an executable and as a Python module to be integrated into workflows
name: CroCo_autogenerated
